trans-unit.source: Defines access levels used by <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> permission classes.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i livelli di accesso utilizzati dalle classi di autorizzazione <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> can create an event source, read existing logs, delete event sources or logs, respond to entries, clear an event log, listen to events, and access a collection of all event logs.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> consente di creare un'origine eventi, leggere i log esistenti, eliminare i log o le origini eventi, rispondere alle immissioni, cancellare un log eventi, utilizzare gli eventi e accedere all’insieme di tutti i log eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> can read existing logs, delete event sources or logs, respond to entries, clear an event log, listen to events, and access a collection of all event logs.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> consente di leggere i log esistenti, eliminare i log o le origini eventi, rispondere alle immissioni, eliminare un log eventi, rispondere agli eventi e accedere all’insieme di tutti i log eventi.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Note" /> This member is now obsolete, use <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Note" /> Questo membro è ora obsoleto. Usare <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> can read existing logs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> consente di leggere i log eventi esistenti.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Note" /> This member is now obsolete, use <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Note" /> Questo membro è ora obsoleto. Usare <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Administer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> can read or write to existing logs, and create event sources and logs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> consente di leggere o scrivere nei log esistenti e creare i log e le origini eventi.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Note" /> This member is now obsolete, use <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Note" /> Questo membro è ora obsoleto. Usare <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> can write to existing logs, and create event sources and logs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> consente di scrivere nei log esistenti e creare log e origini eventi.
